text:
By the way,
Kaho, you're okay with soft serve ice cream, right?

Yes!
I love it, it's delicious!

The soft serve ice cream here
is incredibly delicious!

Hehe, that's right!
It tastes really amazing when you have it at the farm.

Is there something different about it
compared to other soft serve ice creams?

I wonder... We might need to look into it later.
But I'm sure the freshness of the milk is different.

Just like how the taste of fish changes depending
on its freshness, the same might be true for milk.

Ah!
Then... can I drink milk here too!?

It's possible!
Why don't you try after you finish eating?

Yes!
I'd love to give it a try!
